variable.name: Grouping
variable.description: Grouping of participant: immune-compromised or healthy
variable.comment: IC_Other = Immune-compromised other than HIV or Organ Transplant; Transplant = Organ Tx; HIV=HIV positive; Healthy_fever = Healthy child with fever; Healthy_no_fever = Healthy participant with no fever
variable.value: Immune-compromised other than HIV or Organ Transplant

variable.name: Transplant
variable.description: If a Transplant participant: type of organ TX
variable.comment: Liver; Kidney; Heart; BMT; Lung May be two transplant types.

variable.name: Age _years
variable.description: Age in years when participant started study

variable.name: Age_mth
variable.description: Age in months when participant started study

variable.name: Race
variable.comment: Caucasian; African-american; Hispanic; Asian; Native_Am; Other
